## IHeftParameters interface

Parameters provided to a Heft plugin.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IHeftParameters extends IHeftDefaultParameters 
```
**Extends:** [IHeftDefaultParameters](./heft.iheftdefaultparameters.md)
